text: maliaui adeul yesuga iseu la-el jasondeul-iyeo sillo naneun neohui ege bonaeeojin seonjijalosseo nae ap e on guyaggwa nae hue ol aheumad ilan ileum-eul gajin han seonjijaui bog-eum-eul hwagjeunghanola geuleona geuga bunmyeonghan yejeung-eulo geudeul-ege imha yeoss-eul ttae igeos-eun bunmyeonghan masul-ila hayeossdeola
